Mitigation.Apache:
-Quick solution: Replace the instruction of the directive SSLOpenSSLConfCmd groups with the following string:
{total_string}
-Advanced solution: Check the directive SSLOpenSSLConfCmd groups and for each element in the Textual section, follow the instructions provided. The separator for this directive is : and to disable an element it is necessary to remove it from the string.
NOTE: In order to disable ffdhe* groups remove the dhparams from the end of the first certificate file

< 1.0.2.Textual: NOTE: OpenSSL version < 1.0.2 can only use one curve at a time. If you want to use multiple curves, you must upgrade OpenSSL to version 1.0.2 or higher.
